00023 /*
00024  * Pressure Board Navarro (2010)
00025  *
00026  * by Matthieu Navarro
00027  *
00028  * combine differential and absolute pressure sensor (ETS raw sensors)
00029  * controlled by a dspic
00030  * return scaled values over I2C
00031  *
00032  */
00033 
00034 
00035 #ifndef PRESSURE_BOARD_NAVARRO_H
00036 #define PRESSURE_BOARD_NAVARRO_H
00037 
00038 #include "std.h"
00039 #include "mcu_periph/i2c.h"
00040 
00041 extern uint16_t altitude_adc;
00042 extern uint16_t airspeed_adc;
00043 extern uint16_t altitude_offset;
00044 extern uint16_t airspeed_offset;
00045 extern float pbn_altitude, pbn_airspeed;
00046 extern float airspeed_filter;
00047 
00048 extern bool_t data_valid;
00049 extern struct i2c_transaction pbn_trans;
00050 
00051 extern void pbn_init( void );
00052 extern void pbn_periodic( void );
00053 extern void pbn_read_event( void );
00054 
00055 #define PbnEvent() { if (pbn_trans.status == I2CTransSuccess) pbn_read_event(); }
00056 
00057 #define PERIODIC_SEND_PBN(_chan) DOWNLINK_SEND_PBN(DefaultChannel,&airspeed_adc,&altitude_adc,&pbn_airspeed,&pbn_altitude,&airspeed_offset,&altitude_offset);
00058 
00059 #endif // PRESSURE_BOARD_NAVARRO_H
